message.body: So when do u think you'll have a date. Earlier I can get tix the better
For sure, i'll start fishing for available dates for everybody. I'm thinking either aug 17/18 or aug 31/sep 1 right now.
Cool sept 1 weekend best for me. I have off sept 2. But both are cool
Cool. The 1st is my bday so that'd be dope. Well i'll try to make that happen, but i'll let you know.
You might save some money by flying into chicago and riding with my brother in law. He's planning on making it up for the draft.
I'll have to check out the flights. That's a long day tho. Rather fly straight thru
True. From what i saw it was like 150 difference.
guess it depends on how long I'm staying too
Yeah if its a short stay I'd rather fly straight thru too. I'll check it out
If Harr comes hell prolly wanna check out Minneapolis tho
